actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."linuxtest_alert_details" SET
		"hostname" = '{{update_form.fieldState.hostname.isVisible ? update_form.formData.hostname : update_form.sourceData.hostname}}',
		"task_message" = '{{update_form.fieldState.task_message.isVisible ? update_form.formData.task_message : update_form.sourceData.task_message}}',
    "attachement" = '{{update_form.fieldState.attachement.isVisible ? update_form.formData.attachement : update_form.sourceData.attachement}}',
		"task_trigger" = '{{update_form.fieldState.task_trigger.isVisible ? update_form.formData.task_trigger : update_form.sourceData.task_trigger}}',
		"created" = '{{update_form.fieldState.created.isVisible ? update_form.formData.created : update_form.sourceData.created}}',
		"record_dt" = '{{update_form.fieldState.record_dt.isVisible ? update_form.formData.record_dt : update_form.sourceData.record_dt}}',
		"alert_group" = '{{update_form.fieldState.alert_group.isVisible ? update_form.formData.alert_group : update_form.sourceData.alert_group}}'
WHERE "status" = {{data_table.selectedRow.status}};
